subjects: Welcome to the TOWER OF FORTUNA, where the Goddess of Luck, Fortuna, rules with a fair hand. This 3-reel, 5 payline game features revolutionary tower-climbing mechanics, taking your player on a journey up endless levels of the tower every time they lose a spin.
But because Fortuna is fair, she increases a multiplier with every losing spin that is then applied to the player’s eventual winning spin, returning them to the first level of the tower again.
Fortuna gives and takes in a cycle that is beautifully represented in this unique slot, quite unlike any game available!
